extends java.lang.Object
implements CmtCDecommitmentMessage, java.io.Serializable
    Concrete implementation of decommitment message used by SimpleHash commitment scheme.

    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Yael Ejgenberg)
